content.intro: Hi there! I'm Mustafa, a newly graduated software engineer on a journey to transform ideas into impactful solutions that improve lives. My career so far has been an adventure filled with innovation, problem-solving, and a relentless drive to make technology work for people.
content.expertise: I specialize in .Net Core, Spring Boot, RabbitMQ, and modern web technologies. From designing microservices architecture to leading teams in building cutting-edge solutions, I'm passionate about creating systems that empower users and solve real-world challenges.

events.title: What events and activities Mustafa joined recently?

items.title: Velocity Computing
items.description: Started as a Software Engineer, bringing fresh perspectives and technical expertise to innovative projects

items.title: uOttawa TI | IT - Automation Developer / SOC analyst
items.description: Developed automations with Node.Js, Powershell and MS Graph APIs, streamlining incident response procedures. Conducted analysis of 500+ security logs and redesigned identity-protection workflow, increasing threat detection efficiency by 50%

items.title: uOttawa TI | IT - Mobile Application Developer
items.description: Enhanced user interface with React Native and Redux, improved API components and database performance, implemented CI/CD pipeline

projects.title: What projects Mustafa worked on recently?

items.title: Adversarial Evasive PDF Generator
items.description: Led development of an automated PDF generator for testing ML-based phishing detection systems. Implemented Docker-based pipeline with Elastic EDR for automated payload testing

items.title: Enhanced Data Processing with Microservices
items.description: Developed optimized data workflow using .NET microservices, implemented messaging systems (HTTP, gRPC, RabbitMQ), and integrated API Gateway for enhanced security and performance

items.title: Real-Time Digital Alarm System
items.description: Developed embedded system using Nucleo-F446RE and FreeRTOS, featuring keypad interface, OLED display, and optimized task management

one.title: Academic Excellence and Leadership
one.mainQuote: Led development teams in multiple successful projects, demonstrating strong technical and leadership capabilities in software engineering
one.highlightedQuote: Came first and won $5k in a week-long entrepreneurship competition with a team of 5 among 6 teams

author.name: University of Ottawa
author.title: Bachelor of Applied Science - Software Engineering

two.title: Innovation in Security Solutions
two.mainQuote: Redesigned and automated identity-protection workflow, resulting in a 50% increase in threat detection efficiency across 600,000+ accounts
two.highlightedQuote: Successfully integrated advanced security measures and automated response systems for large-scale user protection

three.title: Mobile Development Excellence
three.mainQuote: Transformed user interface and core API components, achieving 40% faster interaction speeds and 50% improvement in data retrieval
three.highlightedQuote: Successfully implemented complex system architecture improvements while maintaining data integrity and user experience
